tours.title: Highlight tours
tours.description: When the most beautiful season hits, K'Lang Adventure brings the unique experiential tours up, into places never before known on the world tourism map - Places that will leave you impressed with the beauty of nature and culture.

list.title: Trekking - Khám phá rừng lim cổ thụ 2 ngày
list.description: Nếu rừng rêu và đỗ quyên trên đỉnh K'lang là thế giới Avatar siêu thực, còn rừng Pd Mu có...

list.title: Trekking - Khám phá rừng rêu và đỉnh K'lang 2 ngày
list.description: Đây là một lịch trình rút gọn với thời gian ngắn nhất để những trekker yêu thiên nhiên và thíc...

list.title: Khám phá Aur - Ngôi làng hạnh phúc trong rừng Trường Sơn
list.description: Nằm sâu giữa đại ngàn Trường Sơn, làng Aur (xã A Vương, Tây Giang) giữ được nét bình yên...

list.title: Khám phá Aur - Ngôi làng hạnh phúc trong rừng Trường Sơn
list.description: Nằm sâu giữa đại ngàn Trường Sơn, làng Aur (xã A Vương, Tây Giang) giữ được nét bình yên...

list.title: Khám phá Aur - Ngôi làng hạnh phúc trong rừng Trường Sơn
list.description: Nằm sâu giữa đại ngàn Trường Sơn, làng Aur (xã A Vương, Tây Giang) giữ được nét bình yên...

info.title: Journey to the hidden sanctuary
info.description: K'Lang Adventure is a journey to discover wonders and preserve values. A place that possesses massive primeval forests and hundreds of precious species - priceless treasures of nature, where there has never been a trace of 'invasion'. A place that depicts the ancient culture of Cơtu, simple-minded and hospitable people are always proud of their national identity.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.description: “Completely-disconnect” from the outside world, immerse yourself in nature through trekking and camping activities in primeval forest. Breathing the cool air,, imbued with the sophistication of the long-standing culture of the Cotu people with the beauty of cuisine, arts and crafts, music and life.

list.title: Stories after each trip
list.comment: Dubbed 'miniature Sapa' or 'Da Lat of the Central region', Tay Giang has been a very hot name on the travel map of backpackers. Coming here, you will not only be immersed in the vast and poetic natural scenery; Enjoy the cool feeling between the mountains and forests or watch the beautiful terraced fields but also admire the floating white clouds with your own eyes.

list.title: Beautifuly
list.comment: Dubbed 'miniature Sapa' or 'Da Lat of the Central region', Tay Giang has been a very hot name on the travel map of backpackers. Coming here, you will not only be immersed in the vast and poetic natural scenery; Enjoy the cool feeling between the mountains and forests or watch the beautiful terraced fields but also admire the floating white clouds with your own eyes.

ads.title: Ưu đãi đặc biệt
ads.content: Đăng ký tour vào tháng 9 tới tháng 12 để đón nhận những ưu đãi đặc biệt từ K'Lang Adventure. K'Lang Adventure - Hành trình khám phá sự bí ẩn

list.title: Chương trình Giá - Siêu Hot - Chào mùa leo núi 2023
content: Mùa leo núi sắp điểm, mùa của những thử thách chạm đỉnh, “săn mây” quên lối về; ngắm view mà ở dưới xuôi người ta gọi là triệu đô; trải nghiệm sự kết hợp hoàn hảo giữa Trekking và Săn mây.

list.title: Chính sách giảm giá chung cho tour ghép
content: Mua tour cho 05 người đi cùng một tour vào một ngày khởi hành: giảm 5%
Mua 02 tour cùng một lúc: giảm 5%

development.title: Our Commitment to Sustainability
development.content: This season – as the first blossoms of spring spark feelings of joy and renewal - we celebrate the exceptional natural environments across the globe that K’Lang Adventure calls home.

top.title: Subscribe to our newsletter!
top.description: Stay in touch and we'll keep you up to speed!

about.title: The story about K'Lang
about.description: K’lang Adventure founded in 2023 is a subsidiary of TAAD Group.  We aim to become a leading travel and tourism enterprises in the Southeast Asian, developing sustainable tourism - experiential tourism.

list.title: Về TAAD
list.description: During 13 years of establishment and development, we are headquartered in Vietnam, the US, and Mexico, with 5 large textile factories and 7 member companies, TAAD Group has become a reputable partner in these fields: Fashion & Garment Export, Real Estate, Transportation, Travel Services. Oriented to a strategy of sustainable development and continuous innovation, we are always confident in providing our partners and customers with the most complete and perfect products, services and experiences.

list.title: K'LANG
list.description: Choosing Tay Giang, Quang Nam - The land of original beauty to implement a project to develop sustainable tourism and recover the cultural identity of the Cotu people, TAAD Group decided to establish Trade Investment Joint Stock Company. K'lang Adventure Tourism Development and Trade.

list.title: TẦM NHÌN, SỨ MỆNH
list.description: Định hướng trở thành doanh nghiệp phát triển Du lịch Bền vững – Du lịch Trải nghiệm mang tầm cỡ khu vực Tứ Giác Đông Nam Á. K’lang Adventure sẽ đồng hành trong sứ mệnh đưa Tây Giang trở thành một trong những điểm đến thu hút khách du lịch trong và ngoài nước về du lịch xanh mang đậm chất liệu văn hóa bản địa đặc sắc hàng đầu Quảng Nam.

list.tourDes: 'Foodstep Of The Co Tu' is an immersive cultural tour that takes you deep into the heart of Tây Giang, where the ancient tradition of Co Tu people come to life. Each day of the journey reflects a different aspect of their rich heritage, from the sacred forests and survival wisdom of their ancestors to their vibrant craftsmanship and communal spirit. The experience begins with a trek through the majesty Pomu forest, home to centuries-old trees and hidden medicinal plants, guided by local experts who share the deep-rooted connection between the Cơ Tu and nature. The journey continues with interactive workshops, where you’ll learn traditional weaving, bamboo musical instrument making, and the art of cooking authentic Co Tu cuisine. Beyond exploring the culture, this tour provides a rare opportunity to live as the Cơ Tu do—staying in traditional homestays, participating in farming activities, and joining nightly gatherings filled with folk dances, storytelling, and music. This hands-on experience not only supports local livelihoods but also preserves a way of life that has been passed down through generations.

detail.tourDes: 'Foodstep Of The Co Tu' is an immersive cultural tour that takes you deep into the heart of Tây Giang, where the ancient tradition of Co Tu people come to life. Each day of the journey reflects a different aspect of their rich heritage, from the sacred forests and survival wisdom of their ancestors to their vibrant craftsmanship and communal spirit. The experience begins with a trek through the majesty Pomu forest, home to centuries-old trees and hidden medicinal plants, guided by local experts who share the deep-rooted connection between the Cơ Tu and nature. The journey continues with interactive workshops, where you’ll learn traditional weaving, bamboo musical instrument making, and the art of cooking authentic Co Tu cuisine. Beyond exploring the culture, this tour provides a rare opportunity to live as the Cơ Tu do—staying in traditional homestays, participating in farming activities, and joining nightly gatherings filled with folk dances, storytelling, and music. This hands-on experience not only supports local livelihoods but also preserves a way of life that has been passed down through generations.

journey.day: 1st day: Đà Nẵng - Thị trấn Tây Giang - Làng A Banh - Điểm cắm trại

details.title: Being available at the pick-up point in Da Nang and then going to Tay Giang.
Arriving in Tay Giang town, following the tour guide, and having breakfast at a local restaurant.

journey.day: 2nd day: K’lang peak - Abanh village - Tay Giang district - Da Nang city

details.title: Waking up early and hiking to the peak to catch the sunrise. K'lang Peak is only about a 15-minute trek from the campsite. After watching the sunrise and taking photos, you will return to the campsite for breakfast.

Having breakfast and drinking coffee at the campsite. After breakfast, we will pack up our belongings and tents to leave the mountain. On the way, we will have time to take photos and explore the Avatar moss forest.

list.question: What is the minimum age for children to join this tour?
list.answer: This tour is suitable for children aged 12 or above and accompanied by parents or adults.

list.question: I don't have trekking experience. Can I join this program?
list.answer: The trek has a steep gradient, especially the nearly 1km incline at the foot of the mountain, so it can be quite challenging for those who are not physically active. You should review the tips and guidelines for preparing for a trip with a difficulty level of 6/10 here.

list.tourDes: The 'Echoes of the Jungle: Tay Giang Survival' tour is a thrilling and immersive adventure that blends survival skills, cultural exploration, and nature discovery. Over two days and one night, travelers will embark on a journey into the pristine forests of Tay Giang, where they will learn essential survival techniques, such as filtering water, setting up shelters, and navigating with compasses and maps. The experience is enriched by cultural interactions with the Co Tu people, including visiting the Guol house, witnessing the vibrant Tung Tung Za Za dance, and enjoying traditional cuisine like bamboo-tube rice, grilled chicken, and herbal-infused dishes. Guests will also partake in team-building activities, such as a 'Treasure Hunt' challenge and a nature photography contest, adding an element of excitement to the adventure. With breathtaking treks through ancient forests, refreshing dips in rocky streams, and evenings spent around a lively campfire, this tour offers an unparalleled opportunity to reconnect with nature, embrace local traditions, and create unforgettable memories in the heart of Tay Giang

detail.tourDes: The 'Echoes of the Jungle: Tay Giang Survival' tour is a thrilling and immersive adventure that blends survival skills, cultural exploration, and nature discovery. Over two days and one night, travelers will embark on a journey into the pristine forests of Tay Giang, where they will learn essential survival techniques, such as filtering water, setting up shelters, and navigating with compasses and maps. list.tourName: TOUR 3 - Combine Cultural and Survival Package
list.tourDes: The 'Pomu Challenge – Calling the Soul of Tay Giang' tour is a thrilling 3-day, 2-night adventure that seamlessly blends survival skills and cultural immersion in the breathtaking highlands of Tay Giang. Travelers will trek through the ancient Pơmu forest, learn to build shelters, filter water, and start fires, while also experiencing the rich traditions of the Cơ Tu people. Highlights include hands-on weaving, bamboo music workshops, and traditional baking, as well as evenings spent enjoying folk dances, storytelling, and BBQ feasts around a campfire. With opportunities to explore pristine waterfalls, sip herbal forest tea at sunrise, and stay in a traditional Guol house, this journey offers the perfect mix of nature, adventure, and culture, leaving travelers with unforgettable memories of Tay Giang

press.title: Press
press.description: Ngắt kết nối hoàn toàn với thế giới bên ngoài, hòa mình vào thiên nhiên qua các hoạt động trekking, camping trong rừng sâu.Hít trọn không khí mát lành của thảm thực vật nguyên sinh, tinh tế trong văn hoá lâu đời của đồng bào Cơtu.
